item.description:
Hi fellow heathens!

Some of you expressed interest in canoeing and kayaking on the Charles this summer, and I thought this weekend would be a great time to give it a whirl. There is an easy location in Kendall Square where they rent kayaks and canoes, for single passengers or multiple. On average, it costs $16/hour, so if you share a canoe or kayak with someone it should be pretty reasonable!

Afterwards, Nora had the brilliant idea to gather for lunch. Tommy Doyles or the CBC are close, so we can decide on Sunday what everyone would prefer.

We hope to see you soon for some on the river fun!

Julie and Nora
item.name: Kayak on the Charles
